author: Jillian Kestler-D'Amours
title: US doctors go online to reveal 'bold, loud' coronavirus truths
description: Healthcare workers turn to social media to raise awareness, lobby for more supplies and build support during pandemic.
content:
Dr Ming Lin says they were reasonable requests.
Set up a triage system outside the hospital, check the temperatures of all patients, visitors and staff before they can go inside, and give healthcare workers scrubs so that they do not risk taking the novel co… [+8624 chars]
